trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties to support the XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 프로세서를 지원하기 위한 메서드 및 속성을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlILIndex" /> class.
Adds a newly built index over the specified context document to the existing collection of indexes.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 컨텍스트 문서의 새로 작성된 인덱스를 기존 인덱스 컬렉션에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="Int32" />.
A value of type <see langword="object" />.
A value of type <see langword="Type" />.
Converts a value from the CLR type of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to CLR <paramref name="destinationType" /> by using V1 XSLT rules.
trans-unit.target: V1 XSLT 규칙을 사용하여 <paramref name="value" /> 매개 변수의 CLR 형식에서 CLR <paramref name="destinationType" />으로 값을 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts any result tree fragment values to nodes.
trans-unit.target: 모든 결과 트리 조각 값을 노드로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="object" />.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
A value of type <see langword="object" />.

Converts from the CLR type of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the default CLR type by which intermediate language generation represents the XML type, based on the conversion rules of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: XML 형식의 변환 규칙에 따라 <paramref name="value" /> 매개 변수의 CLR 형식에서 중간 언어 생성이 XML 형식을 나타내는 기본 CLR 형식으로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="object" />.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
Compares the relative positions of two navigators.

-1 if <paramref name="navigatorThis" /> is before <paramref name="navigatorThat" />; 1 if <paramref name="navigatorThis" /> is after <paramref name="navigatorThat" />; 0 if both navigators are positioned at the same node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="navigatorThis" />가 <paramref name="navigatorThat" />의 앞에 있으면 -1, <paramref name="navigatorThis" />가 <paramref name="navigatorThat" />의 뒤에 있으면 1, 두 탐색기가 동일 노드에 위치하면 0입니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="string" />.
Creates a collation from a string.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlCollation" /> class.
Returns an array containing the names of all the global variables and parameters used in this query.
trans-unit.target: 이 쿼리에 사용된 모든 전역 변수 및 매개 변수의 이름을 포함하는 배열을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="string" /> values.
The format of the returned array is `{namespace}prefix:local-name`.
A value of type <see langword="string" />.
Gets the value of a global value that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 이름을 가진 전역 값의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A sequence of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> instances, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no global value that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> 인스턴스의 시퀀스이거나, 지정된 이름의 전역 값이 없으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> class.
Converts a sequence to its appropriate XSLT type.
A value of type <see langword="object" />.
A value of type <see langword="string" />.
A value of type <see langword="object" />.
Sets the value of a global value that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 이름을 가진 전역 값의 값을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A sequence of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> instances.
Gets distinct sorted nodes from the specified sequence.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 시퀀스에서 정렬된 고유 노드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> objects.
The method name to look for.
Identifies the early-bound object.
Determines whether the specified early-bound object contains a method with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 초기 바인딩된 개체에 지정된 이름의 메서드가 있는지를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the early-bound object identified by <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> contains a method that matches <paramref name="name" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="namespaceUri" />로 식별된 초기 바인딩된 개체에 <paramref name="name" />과 일치하는 메서드가 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> class.
Finishes constructing an RTF.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> class.
Finishes constructing a nested sequence of items.
A sequence of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> class.
Returns the object that manages external user context information, such as data sources, parameters, extension objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스, 매개 변수, 확장명 개체 등의 외부 사용자 컨텍스트 정보를 관리하는 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryContext" /> class.
The context document.
The index ID to look for.
The returned index.
Returns the index with the specified ID if it has already been created over the specified document, and returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 문서의 인덱스가 이미 생성되었으면 지정된 ID의 인덱스를 반환하고 <see langword="true" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, creates a new, empty index and returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 빈 인덱스를 새로 만들고 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlILIndex" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
Generate a unique string identifier for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 노드에 대한 고유 문자열 식별자를 생성합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="string" />.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Gets the atomized name at the specified index in the array of names.
trans-unit.target: 이름 배열의 지정된 인덱스에서 원자화된 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="string" />.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Gets a collation that was statically created.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlCollation" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Gets the specifiied early-bound extension object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 초기 바인딩된 확장명 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If this object does not yet exist, creates an instance using the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체가 아직 없으면 해당하는 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />를 사용하여 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="object" />.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 전역 변수에 바인딩된 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not yet been computed, computes it and stores it in the global variable.
trans-unit.target: 값이 아직 계산되지 않았으면 값을 계산하여 해당 전역 변수에 저장합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value that is bound to the specified global variable.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Gets the name filter at the specified index in the array of filters.
trans-unit.target: 필터 배열의 지정된 인덱스에서 이름 필터를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType" /> class.
Gets a filter that filters nodes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 형식의 노드를 필터링하는 필터를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
Returns true if the specified global value has already been computed.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 전역 변수가 이미 계산되었으면 true를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value has been computed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 값이 계산되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" /> and <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> properties of two <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> instances to check if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" /> 인스턴스의 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 속성을 비교하여 같은지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.

Compares the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" /> and <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> properties of two <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> instances to check if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" /> 인스턴스의 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 속성을 비교하여 같은지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the names are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이름이 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.
A value of type <see langword="int" />.

Determines whether the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" /> and <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> are equal to the names specified in the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName" />의 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 속성이 매개 변수에 지정된 이름과 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the names are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이름이 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime.IsQNameEqual%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime.GetAtomizedName%2A> method to get the local name and the namespace URI based on the `indexLocalName` and `indexNamespaceUri`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime.IsQNameEqual%2A> 메서드 호출의 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime.GetAtomizedName%2A> 에 따라 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 URI 가져오는 방법을 `indexLocalName` 및 `indexNamespaceUri`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the type of the specified item matches the specified XML type.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 항목의 형식이 지정한 XML 형식과 일치하면 <see langword="true" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> objects.
The index.
Returns <see langword="true" /> if the type of every item in the specified sequence matches the XML type that the specified index identifies.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 시퀀스에 포함된 모든 항목의 형식이 지정한 인덱스로 식별되는 XML 형식과 일치하면 <see langword="true" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type of <paramref name="seq" /> is a subtype of the <paramref name="indexType" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seq" />의 형식이 <paramref name="indexType" />의 하위 형식이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A sequence of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> instances.
A singleton type.
Determines whether the type of the specified sequence is a subtype of the specified singleton type.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 시퀀스의 형식이 지정한 singleton 형식의 하위 형식인지를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type of <paramref name="seq" /> is a subtype the type specified by <paramref name="code" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seq" />의 형식이 <paramref name="code" />에 지정된 형식의 하위 형식이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> class.
The index in the array of XML types..
Returns <see langword="true" /> if the type of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> object matches the specified XML type.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> 개체의 형식이 지정한 XML 형식과 일치하면 <see langword="true" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> matches the specified XML type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" />의 형식이 지정한 XML 형식과 일치하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode" /> class.

Returns <see langword="true" /> if the type of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> object is a subtype of a type identified by the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> 개체의 형식이 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode" />로 식별된 형식의 하위 형식이면 <see langword="true" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the type of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> object is a subtype of a type identified by the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode" />, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem" /> 개체의 형식이 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode" />로 식별된 형식의 하위 형식이면 <see langword="true" />를 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name table used to atomize all names used by the query.
trans-unit.target: 쿼리에서 사용하는 모든 이름을 원자화하는 데 사용되는 이름 테이블을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> class.
<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object that identifies the node.
Used for debugging in Visual Studio.
Called after the current node has changed.
An integer that indicates the status of the change.
Used for internal testing only.
Gets the output writer object.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> class.
Parses the specified tag name.
The tag name.
The index.
Parses the specified tag name and resolves the resulting prefix.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 태그 이름을 구분 분석하고 결과 접두사를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the prefix cannot be resolved, an error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 접두사를 확인할 수 없으면 오류가 throw됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> class.
The tag name.
The namespace.
Parses the specified tag name.
Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that consists of the parsed local name and the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 구분 분석한 로컬 이름과 지정한 네임스페이스로 구성되는 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="string" />.
Reports query execution information to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기에 쿼리 실행 정보를 보고합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="int" />.
A value of type <see langword="object" />.
Returns the value that is bound to the specified global variable or parameter.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 전역 변수 또는 매개 변수에 바인딩된 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="string" />.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> class.
Starts constructing an RTF and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> object that will be used to construct this RTF.
trans-unit.target: RTF 생성을 시작하고 이 RTF를 생성하는 데 사용될 새 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> class.
Starts constructing a nested sequence of items.
Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" /> that will be used to construct this new sequence.
trans-unit.target: 이 새로운 시퀀스를 생성하는 데 사용될 새 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryOutput" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="string" />.
A value of type <see langword="string" />.
Constructs a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> from the specified text.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> class.
A value of type <see langword="string" />.
Throws an XML exception that has the specified message text.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 메시지 텍스트를 포함하는 XML 예외를 throw합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that manages the state.
The state object is required to implement various XSLT functions.
trans-unit.target: 다양한 XSLT 함수를 구현하는 데 필요한 상태 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XsltLibrary" /> class.
